location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has a hole in its text.

mods.abstract: Letter requests for 5,000 rupees to be sent as LaTouche and Abraham and are unable to borrow any money in Bussora [Basra] nor make any sales.
